input_text:
Job Title: Marketing Coordinator- TEMP

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
About FirstbaseRemote work is the biggest workplace revolution in history. Nothing will deliver a higher quality of life upgrade in the next decade. The biggest challenge is in providing the core infrastructure that makes going remote easy for companies. Firstbase helps companies setup, manage, maintain and retrieve all the physical equipment remote workers need to do great work at home.We're a small and fully distributed team, currently spanning from the US to Berlin and we take pride in our ability to function as an effective remote-first organization. We offer market-rate salaries (including equity), a home office (via Firstbase), insurance, as many books as you could ever hope to read, and a tight-knit group of people passionate about creating for the future of work.About This PositionSupport the planning, execution, and tracking of marketing programs such as traditional advertising, digital advertising, print, email, event, and social media.Coordinate marketing campaigns, including writing copy, ordering creative, proofreading, scheduling, testing, and reporting.Evaluate and monitor marketing performance on an on-going basis by analyzing key metrics and maintain comprehensive reports from multiple sources/platforms and for performance visibility.
This is a remote position that can be done from anywhere in the U.S. Compensation: 20 Hours a week @ $25-30/hr
Key ResponsibilitiesCreate, proofread, and edit copy for various marketing channels, ensuring consistent voice.Assist with coordinating sponsorships and other events as needed from time to time.Coordinate and help manage email marketing campaigns, including segmentation, messaging, and report.Prepare reports on campaign performance, website traffic, and social media engagement to inform future strategies.Content Creation: Generate engaging and relevant content for our website and social media channels.Conduct market research and analyze industry trends, competitor activities, and customer behavior to identify opportunities for growth and improvement.Support the creation of marketing collateral, such as brochures, presentations, website content, and other promotional materials.
Role Requirements:BA/BS degree or similar university level education; in lieu of degree, relevant skills or equivalent experience1-2 years or marketing or sales development experienceHigh attention to detailsForward looking can-do attitudeStrong written, verbal and collaboration skillsThe ability to create and edit posts, stories, and reels for social media
We’re committed to building a culturally diverse team and strongly encourage you to apply regardless of your location, background, race, gender, sexual orientation or any other personally defining attribute. We encourage every person who is interested to apply. We’re imperfect communicators, so think of our job postings as the starting point for discussion rather than proof that you shouldn’t apply. Take the leap - you never know, you might just be the perfect person for one of our open roles, even if you don’t match 100% of the job description.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Marketing Coordinator- TEMP
output_json.summary: Support the planning, execution, and tracking of marketing programs such as traditional advertising, digital advertising, print, email, event, and social media.
preferred_degrees: BA/BS degree or similar university level education
optional_skills: Strong written, verbal and collaboration skills
Ability to create and edit posts, stories, and reels for social media
soft_skills: Strong written, verbal and collaboration skills
job_responsibilities: Create, proofread, and edit copy for various marketing channels, ensuring consistent voice.
Assist with coordinating sponsorships and other events as needed from time to time.
Coordinate and help manage email marketing campaigns, including segmentation, messaging, and report.
Prepare reports on campaign performance, website traffic, and social media engagement to inform future strategies.
Content Creation: Generate engaging and relevant content for our website and social media channels.
Conduct market research and analyze industry trends, competitor activities, and customer behavior to identify opportunities for growth and improvement.
Support the creation of marketing collateral, such as brochures, presentations, website content, and other promotional materials.
benefits: Tight-knit team passionate about creating for the future of work
output_json.company_information: FirstbaseRemote work is the biggest workplace revolution in history. We're a small and fully distributed team, currently spanning from the US to Berlin.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We’re committed to building a culturally diverse team and strongly encourage you to apply regardless of your location, background, race, gender, sexual orientation or any other personally defining attribute.
